<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/158623</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>158623</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2261</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Water storage in aquifers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wasserspeicher in den Aquifers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mémoire de l'eau en couches aquifères</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Armazenamento da água nos aquifers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Innaffi la memoria in strati acquiferi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αποθήκευση ύδατος στα υδροφόρα στρώματα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Almacenaje del agua en acuíferos</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An animation which demonstrates the artificial production of aquifers for water storage and its retrieval when necessaty</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">aquifers</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Animation, die die künstliche Produktion 
von Aquifers für Wasserspeicher und seine Wiederherstellung zeigt, 
wenn necessaty</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une animation qui démontre la production 
artificielle des couches aquifères pour la mémoire de l'eau et sa 
recherche si necessaty</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um animation que demonstre a produção 
artificial dos aquifers para o armazenamento da água e a sua 
recuperação quando necessaty</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una animazione che dimostra la produzione 
artificiale degli strati acquiferi per registrazione dell'acqua ed il 
relativo ricerca una volta necessaty</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ζωτικότητα που καταδεικνύει την τεχνητή παραγωγή 
των υδροφόρων στρωμάτων για την αποθήκευση ύδατος και την 
ανάκτησή της όταν necessaty</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una animación que demuestra la producción 
artificial de los acuíferos para el almacenaje del agua y su 
extracción cuando es necessaty</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Aquifers</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wasser</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">couches aquifères</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'eau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">aquifers</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">água</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">strati acquiferi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">acqua</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">υδροφόρα στρώματα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ύδωρ</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">acuíferos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">agua</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>

        <educational>

          <typicalAgeRange>

          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

        <classification>

          <taxonPath>

              <id>1380</id>
